codeMarkPlus.defaultLanguage.description: Default language to be used for comments.

codeMarkPlus.isCommentMessageWrapped.description: Determine whether to wrap the comment message with additional formatting or markers.

codeMarkPlus.commentDelimiter.description: Delimiter to separate different elements inside the comment message (e.g., file name, function).

codeMarkPlus.commentMessagePrefix.description: Prefix added at the beginning of the comment message.

codeMarkPlus.commentMessageSuffix.description: Suffix added at the end of the comment message.

codeMarkPlus.addEmptyLineBeforeComment.description: Insert an empty line before the comment message for improved readability.

codeMarkPlus.addEmptyLineAfterComment.description: Insert an empty line after the comment message for improved readability.

codeMarkPlus.literalOpen.description: The opening character used to delimit string literals (e.g., double quotes, single quotes, backticks).

codeMarkPlus.literalClose.description: The closing character used to delimit string literals (e.g., double quotes, single quotes, backticks).

codeMarkPlus.useCurrentPosition.description: Use the current cursor position to insert the comment.

codeMarkPlus.author.description: The author's name for the comment.

codeMarkPlus.highlightActive.description: Enable dynamic highlighting while the editor is active.

bold.description: The text style for bold keywords.

italic.description: The text style for italic keywords.

underline.description: The text style for underlined keywords.

codeMarkPlus.highlightRules.description: List of highlight rules for keywords. Each rule must define a keyword, a background color, and optionally text styles.

codeMarkPlus.specialHighlightDecoration.description: Configuration for the decoration applied to special highlight directives (e.g., 'HIGHLIGHT: next line').

language.description: The programming language for which this template applies (e.g., 'javascript', 'python', 'dart').

template.description: The comment message template. Use variables like {{{commentMessagePrefix}}}, {{{commentMessageSuffix}}, etc. Example: "// {{{commentMessagePrefix}}} {{{fileName}}} {{{commentMessageSuffix}}"

codeMarkPlus.customTemplates.description: Custom comment message templates for different languages. You can define a template per language using available variables (e.g., {{{commentMessagePrefix}}}, {{{commentMessageSuffix}}, {{{fileName}}, {{{author}}).
